indicator_1.label: Availability Of Strategic Plan With Vision, Mission, Organisational Structure and Budget Proposal In Strategic Plan
options: 0: The school has No Strategic Plan
1: The Strategic plan is available with no vision and mission
2: The strategic plan includes clear vision and mission
3: The available strategic plan includes clear vision, mission, and organizational structure
4: The school has a strategic plan that includes clear vision, mission, organizational structure, and budget proposal in strategic plan

indicator_2.label: Availability of the school's annual action plan
options: 0: There is no school's annual action plan
2: The school has an action plan
4: The school has an annual action plan with reasonable teaching and learning activities

indicator_3.label: Availability of the school Annual budget Plan
options: 0: There is no the school Annual budget Plan
2: The school has an budget plan
4: The school has an Annual budget Plan with focus on teaching and learning

indicator_4.label: Availability Of official registration Documents (RGB or RDB, to be uploaded)
options: 0: The school has no registration certificate in RGB or RDB
4: The school has registration certificate in RGB/ RDB

indicator_5.label: Availability the school owner's land title or rent contract (to be uploaded)
options: 0: The school owner has no rent contract or land title
1: The school is operating in the facilities which are rented and the contract term is valid for 1 year or has a land title having 25% or less of required area
2: The school is operating in the facilities which are rented and the contract term is valid for 2 to 3 years or has a land title having 26 to 50% of required area
3: The school is operating in the facilities which are rented and the contract term is valid for 4 years or has a land title having 51 to 75% of required area
4: The school is operating in the facilities which are rented and the contract term is valid for 5 years or has a land title having 76 to 100% of required area

indicator_6.label: Availability Of At Least One Classroom By Each Level (3 for preprimary, 3 for combinations, TVET trades L3-5 and OL, 6 for primary, 1 for L1 or L2 TVET trades
options: 0: The school has no classrooms for the applied level/ trade/combinations
2: The school has 50% and above (not all) of classrooms for the applied level/ trade/combinations
4: The school has all required classrooms for the applied level/trade/combination

indicator_7.label: Each Classroom Has 2 Doors and Sufficient Windows
options: 0: No classroom Available for the applied level/ trade/combinations
1: Approximately 1-25% Classrooms have 2 doors and windows with an area ranging from 1-10% of floor area
2: Approximately 26-50% Classrooms have 2 doors and windows with an area ranging from 11-15% of floor area
3: Approximately 51-75% Classroom have 2 doors and windows with an area ranging from 16-20% of floor area
4: Approximately 76-100% Classrooms have 2 doors and windows with an area ranging from 21-25% of floor area

indicator_8.label: Each Classroom has Maximum Capacity of 46 students (for special considerations, less capacity may be considered and a student take 1.2 to 2.5 sqm)
options: 0: All available classrooms do not have a Maximum Capacity Of 46 students or a student can not take 1.2 to 2.5 sqm
1: Approximately 1-25% of classrooms have a Maximum Capacity Of 46 students or 1-25% of students can take 1.2 to 2.5 sqm
2: 26-50% of classrooms have a Maximum Capacity Of 46 students or 26-50% of students can take 1.2 to 2.5 sqm
3: 51-75% of classrooms have a Maximum Capacity Of 46 students or 51-75% of students can take 1.2 to 2.5 sqm
4: 76-100% of classrooms have a Maximum Capacity Of 46 students or 76-100% of students can take 1.2 to 2.5 sqm

indicator_9.label: Availability Of Electricity In All Classrooms
options: 0: No classroom has electricity
1: Approximately 1-25% of all classrooms have electricity
2: 26-50% of all classrooms have electricity
3: 51-75% of all classrooms have electricity
4: 76-100% of all classrooms have electricity

indicator_10.label: Availability Of At Least 1 Smart Classroom
options: 0: The school has No smart classroom available
1: The school has a smart classroom with Approximately 1-25% of smart classroom requirements (at least 30 computers, projector, room to accommodate at least 30 students and internet)
2: The school has a smart classroom with Approximately 26-50% of smart classroom requirements (at least 30 computers, projector, room to accommodate at least 30 students and internet)
3: The school has a smart classroom with Approximately 51-75% of smart classroom requirements (at least 30 computers, projector, room to accommodate at least 30 students and internet)
4: The school has a smart classroom with Approximately 76-100% of smart classroom requirements (at least 30 computers, projector, room to accommodate at least 30 students and internet)

indicator_11.label: Availability of Computer Laboratory with sufficient Computers (computer for Each student during lesson delivery)
options: 0: The school has No computer for students
1: The school has a computer laboratory and approximately 1-25% of students have computers during the lesson delivery in computer laboratory
2: The school has a computer laboratory and approximately 26-50% of students have computers during the lesson delivery in computer laboratory
3: The school has a computer laboratory and approximately 51-75% of students have computers during the lesson delivery in computer laboratory
4: The school has a computer laboratory and approximately 76-100% of students have computers during the lesson delivery in computer laboratory

indicator_12.label: Availability Of Computer Laboratory Having at least 90sqm with 2 Doors and Sufficient windows
options: 0: The school has No computer Laboratory
1: The Available Computer Laboratory has at least 90sqm, at least 1 door and windows have an area ranging from 1-10% of floor area
2: The Available Computer Laboratory has at least 90sqm, at least 1 or 2 openings having an area ranging from 11-15% of floor area
3: The Available Computer Laboratory has at least 90sqm, 2 doors and windows have an area ranging from 16-20% of floor area
4: The Available Computer Laboratory has at least 90sqm, 2 doors and windows have an area ranging from 21-25% of floor area

indicator_13.label: Availability of Technical Workshops and/or science Laboratories (For TVET schools, science combinations, and ordinary level)
options: 0: The school has no Workshop and/or science Laboratory for the requested trades/ combination
1: The school has a Workshop and/or science Laboratory for the requested trade/combination with a Capacity to host approximately 1%-25% of students on average
2: The school has a Workshop and/or science Laboratory for the requested trade/combination with a Capacity to host approximately 26%-50% of students on average
3: The school has a Workshop and/or science Laboratory for the requested trade/combination with a Capacity to host approximately 51%-75% of students on average
4: The school has a Workshop and/or science Laboratory for the requested trade/combination with a Capacity to host approximately 76%-100% of students on average

indicator_14.label: Availability Of Store For Tools And Materials For Each Workshop science laboratory
options: 0: There is no workshop or The workshop or science laboratory has no Store For Tools And Materials
1: The workshop or science laboratory has Store For Tools And Materials and Approximately 1-25% storage capacity
2: The workshop or science laboratory has Store For Tools And Materials and Approximately 26-50% storage capacity
3: The workshop or science laboratory has Store For Tools And Materials and Approximately 51-75% storage capacity
4: The workshop or science laboratory has Store For Tools And Materials and Approximately 76-100% storage capacity

indicator_15.label: Availability Of A Library Of 7Mx10M Having 2 Doors And 4 Windows
options: 0: The school has no No library
1: The school has a library with a floor area of approximately 18sqm and having, 1 door and 2 windows
2: The school has a library with a floor area of approximately 35sqm and having, 2 door and 4 windows
3: The school has a library with a floor area of approximately 50sqm and having, 2 door and 4 windows
4: The school has a library with a floor area of 70sqm or more and having, 2 door and 4 windows

indicator_16.label: Availability Of Electricity In the workshop or laboratory
options: 0: There is no electricity in the workshop or science laboratories
4: There is electricity in the workshop or science laboratories

indicator_17.label: Availability Of Toilet For Staff For Each Gender That Can Serve At Least 15 Staff
options: 0: The school has no Toilets For Staff For Each Gender that can serve 15 staff or students and staff share toilets
2: The school has one toilet shared by both female and male staff or has 2 toilets for (one for each gender) but shared by more than 15 staff each
4: The school has sufficient Toilets for staff For Each Gender shared by 15 staff or less each

indicator_18.label: Availability Of Toilet For Learners For Each Gender That Can Serve students (30 for Girls and 40 for Boys)
options: 0: The school has no Toilet For Learners For Each Gender
1: The school has Toilets that Serve all learners regardless of gender
2: The school has Toilets For Learners For Each Gender shared by more than 30 for Girls and 40 for Boys
3: The school has Toilets For Learners For Each Gender shared by more than 30 for Girls and 40 for Boys and a Separate Toilets for people with disability is available
4: The school has Toilets For Learners For Each Gender shared by 30 for Girls and 40 for Boys or less and 2 Separate Toilets for people with disability

indicator_19.label: Availability of At Least One Convenient Academic Staff Room
options: 0: The school has no Academic Staff Room
1: The school has an Academic Staff Room that can serve up to 25% of the available teaching staff
2: The school has an Academic Staff Room that can serve up to 50% of the available teaching staff
3: The school has an Academic Staff Room that can serve up to 75% of the available teaching staff
4: The school has an Academic Staff Room that serve 76%-100% of the available teaching staff

indicator_20.label: Availability of an equipped administration block for all staff on the school structure
options: 0: The school has no administration block or offices for administration
1: The school has administrative block or offices that serve up to 25% of the staff on the school organisational structure
2: The school has administrative block or offices that serve up to 50% of the staff on the school organisational structure
3: The school has administrative block or offices that serve up to 75% of the staff on the school organisational structure and offices are equipped with chairs, tables and cupboards
4: The school has administrative block or offices that all the staff on the school organisational structure and offices are equipped with chairs, tables and cupboards

indicator_21.label: Availability Of Internet Connectivity In All Administrative Offices and teaching staff
options: 0: There is no internet for both administrative staff and teaching staff
2: There is internet for only the administrative staff
4: There is internet with sufficient coverage for both administrative and teaching staff

indicator_22.label: Availability Of Administrative Facilities Constructed With Authorised Materials
options: 0: The school has no administration block or offices for administration
2: The school has an administration block or offices for administration made of adobe bricks or which are very old
4: The school has an administration block or offices for administration made of burnt bricks

indicator_23.label: Availability Of A Dining Hall With (6 Windows And 2 Doors, Container Of Portable Water,Shelves To Store Plates And Cups,Ceiling To Prevent Noise ) (For boarding schools)
options: 0: The school has no dining hall
1: The school has a dining hall with only 1 door and less than 6 windows, with a capacity to hold up to 25% of students
2: The school has a dining hall with 2 door and 6 windows, with a capacity to hold up to 50% of students
3: The school has a dining hall with 2 door and 6 windows and the capacity to host all students at the same time but without convenient furniture

4: The school has a dining hall with 2 door and 6 windows and the capacity to host all students at the same time, having a container of portable water, shelves to store plates and cups, ceiling to prevent noise

indicator_24.label: Availability Of A Space For Hand Washing Facilities(in Toilet, at Gate, in Dinning Hall, Others Places Not Mentioned)
options: 0: The school has no Hand washing facilities
1: The school has at least one place For Hand washing facilities
2: The school has two places For Hand washing facilities but still insufficient (serve up to 50% of students)
3: The school has two or more places For Hand washing facilities but still insufficient (serve up to 75%of students)
4: The school has the hand washing facilities in every critical part (toilet,gate,dinning hall, others places not mentioned) and serve all students at the school

indicator_25.label: Availability Of A Kitchen (With Modern Cooking Stove, Means Allowing To Keep Clean Water,Tiling For Kitchen)
options: 0: There is no Kitchen at the school
1: Kitchen is a self adapted and has no cooking stove
2: The school has a Kitchen with Modern Cooking Stove
3: There is a Kitchen with Modern Cooking Stove with the capacity to serve all students at the same time (not cooking in shift)
4: The school has a Kitchen with Modern Cooking Stove, Means to Keep Clean Water and Tiling inside the Kitchen

indicator_26.label: Availability Of A Playground For Different Games And Sports Which Can Accommodate students And Staff
options: 0: The school has no Playground
1: The school has one Playground
2: The school has two operational Playground For Different Games And Sports Which Can Accommodate students And Staff
3: The school has three operational Playground For Different Games And Sports Which Can Accommodate students And Staff
4: The school has four or more operational Playground For Different Games And Sports Which Can Accommodate students And Staff

indicator_27.label: Availability Of Water Tanks for rainwater harvesting system
options: 0: The school has no Rain Water Harvesting System facilities
1: Only Up to 25% of the school buildings have the Rain Water Harvesting System
2: only Up to 50% of the school buildings have the Rain Water Harvesting System
3: only Up to 75% of the school buildings have the Rain Water Harvesting System
4: 75 to 100 % of the school buildings have the Rain Water Harvesting System

indicator_28.label: Availability Of A Dormitory Constructed (With Authorized Construction Materials, Toilets And Bathroom In The Same Building, A Mosquito Net For Each Trainee,Tiling For Toilets & Bathroom For Dormitory) (For boarding schools)
options: 2: The dormitory is available Constructed and accommodate up to 50% of students
3: The school has dormitories that are Constructed With Authorized Construction Materials (burnt bricks,tubes,ects),Toilets And Bathroom and can host up to 90% of students

4: The school has dormitories that are Constructed With Authorized Construction Materials,Toilets And Bathroom In The Same Building,A Mosquito Net For Each Trainee,Tiling For Toilets And Bathroom For Dormitory) and have a capacity to host all students

indicator_29.label: Availability Of Pathway For The People With Disability
options: 0: There are no Pathway For The People With Disability
1: Pathway For The People With Disability are partly available
2: Pathway For The People With Disability are fully available within in the school premises.
3: Pathway For The People With Disability are available and half covered in school premises
4: Pathway For The People With Disability are available within in the school premises and fully covered

indicator_30.label: Availability Of a Special Room For Female Learners (Girl's room) (for primary students and above)
options: 0: The school has no Special Room For Female Learners
1: The school has a self adapted Room For Female Learners and there are no required materials
2: The school has a Special Room For Female Learners with essential materials to be used
3: The school has a Special Room For Female Learners, with essential materials to be used and having bathroom inside
4: The school has a Special Room For Female Learners, with with essential materials to be used and having bathroom and toilet inside

indicator_31.label: Availability Of Clean Drinking Water
options: 0: The school has no Clean Drinking Water
1: Tape water is available and drunk with out boiling
2: Tape water is available, boiled and kept in Jericans
3: The school has a filtering system (smart tank) for Clean Drinking Water
4: The school has a filtering system (smart tank) for Clean Drinking Water with enough clean cups

indicator_32.label: Availability Of A Garden And Trees In The School Yard (Greening)
options: 0: The school has no garden And Trees In The School Yard
2: The school is partly gardened
4: The school is completely green and has a Well maintained Garden

indicator_33.label: Availability Of Basic Cleanliness in key places (Toilet, Classroom, Kitchen, Dormitory, Dining (Absence Of Bushes And Pools Of Water)
options: 0: No cleanliness is found in all corners of the school
2: The school is partly clean
4: All key parts of the school are clean with Absence Of Bushes And Pools Of Water

indicator_34.label: Availability Of Waste Management Facilities (composting, land filling)
options: 0: There are no facilities for the management (disposal) of degradable and non degradable waste
2: The school has facilities for the management (disposal) of waste but degradable and non degradable waste are mixed
3: The school has facilities for separate disposal degradable and non degradable waste which are not covered
4: The school has facilities for separate disposal degradable and non degradable waste and are covered

indicator_35.label: Availability Of A Multi-Purpose Hall (For boarding schools)
options: 0: There is No Multi-purpose Hall
1: The school has Multi-purpose Hall with a capacity to host up to 50% of students
2: The school has Multi-purpose Hall with a capacity to host up to 75% of students
3: The school has Multi-purpose Hall with a capacity to host all students
4: The school has Multi-purpose Hall with a capacity to host all students and toilet inside and changing room

indicator_36.label: Availability Of At Least A Valid Fire Extinguisher
options: 0: The school has No (Valid) Fire Extinguisher at all
1: 1-25% of Buildings have Valid Fire Extinguisher
2: 26-50% of Buildings have Valid Fire Extinguisher
3: 51-75% of Buildings have Valid Fire Extinguisher
4: All (or 76-100% of) Buildings have Valid Fire Extinguisher

indicator_37.label: Availability Of At Least A Lightening Arrestor
options: 0: The school has no Lightening Arrestor
1: At least Lightening Arrestors covering 0-25% school surface is available
2: At least Lightening Arrestors covering 25-50% school surface is available
3: At least Lightening Arrestors covering 50-75% school surface is available
4: At least Lightening Arrestors covering 100% school surface is available

indicator_38.label: Availability Of A Fence Built In Accordance With The Norms Of Construction Which Guarantee The Security Of Learners And The School Property
options: 0: The school is not fenced
1: Half Fenced
3: 51%-75% of school is fenced with durable materials
4: All parts of the school (or 76-100% of) are fenced with required materials

indicator_39.label: Availability Of At Least An External Lighting In All Buildings
options: 0: No External Lighting In All Buildings
1: up to 25% building have External Lighting
2: 26-50% building have External Lighting
3: 51-75% building have External Lighting
4: 76-100% building have External Lighting

indicator_40.label: Availability of materials, Tools and Equipment (teaching aids,charts, teacher's guides, laboratory materials, TVET tools and equipment for TVET schools,….), (to Upload a list of STEL for TVET or laboratory materials for science combinations)
options: 0: No Tools and Equipment or science laboratory materials are available
1: The Available Tools and Equipment or materials correspond to up to 25% of the required.
2: The school has up to 50% of the required Tools and Equipment or science laboratory materials
3: The school has up to 75% of the required Tools and Equipment or science laboratory materials
4: The school has up to 76 to 100% of the required Tools and Equipment or science laboratory materials

indicator_41.label: Availibility of approved curriculum for the implemented program
options: 0: The school has no approved national curriculum or has no licence for international curriculum
4: The school has an approved national curriculum or has licence for international curriculum

indicator_42.label: Availability of students Textbooks and other reading materials
options: 0: No Reading Material, such as book and/or e-resource
1: Available Reading Materials, such as books and/or e-resources, to be used by approximately 1%-25% of students on average for every trade
2: Available Reading Materials, such as books and/or e-resources, to be used by approximately 26%-50% of students on average for every trade
3: Available Reading Materials, such as books and/or e-resources, to be used by approximately 51%-75% of students on average for every trade
4: Available Reading Materials, such as books and/or e-resources, to be used by approximately 76%-100% of students on average for every trade

indicator_43.label: Availability Of A Projector In Each level
options: 0: The school has no projector
1: Approximately 1-25% of projectors are available in each level
2: Approximately 26-50% of projectors are available in each level
3: Approximately 51-75% of projectors are available in each level
4: Approximately 76-100% of projectors are available in each level

indicator_44.label: Availability Of One Desk Per Two students (Seat And Table )
options: 0: Each desk is shared by more than two students
1: Only up to 25% of desks are occupied by 2 students maximum
2: Only 26%-50% of desks are occupied by 2 students maximum
3: Only 51%-75% of desks are occupied by 2 students maximum
4: Approximately 76%-100% of desks are occupied by 2 students maximum

indicator_45.label: Availability Of One Chair For teacher In Each Classroom
options: 0: No classroom has teacher's chair
1: Approximately up 25% classrooms have teacher's chair
2: Approximately 25%-50% classrooms have teacher's chair
3: Approximately 51%-75% classrooms have teacher's chair
4: Approximately 76%-100% classrooms have teacher's chair

indicator_46.label: Availability Of One Table For teacher In Each Classroom
options: 0: No classroom has teacher's table
1: Approximately up to 25% classrooms have teacher's table
2: Approximately 25%-50% classrooms have teacher's table
3: Approximately 51%-75% classrooms have teacher's table
4: Approximately 76%-100% classrooms have teacher's table

indicator_47.label: Availability Of Shelves To Store Materials In Each Classroom
options: 0: when all classrooms do not have shelves
1: Approximately up to 25% classrooms have shelves
2: Approximately 25%-50% classrooms have shelves
3: Approximately 51%-75% classrooms have shelves
4: Approximately 76%-100% classrooms have shelves

indicator_48.label: Availability Of Dustbin In Each Classroom And Workshop/laboratory/library
options: 0: When no dustbin is available in all classroom and workshop
1: Approximately up 25% classrooms and workshops have dustbin
2: Approximately 25%-50% classrooms and workshops have dustbin
3: Approximately 51%-75% classrooms and workshops have dustbin
4: Approximately 76%-100% classrooms and workshops have dustbin

indicator_49.label: availability of Sufficient of teachers (application to an already operating school)
options: 0: the school lacks 50% of the required teachers
2: The school has up 80% of the required teachers
4: The school has all required teachers

indicator_50.label: Availability Of Qualified teachers (application to an already operating school)
options: 0: All teachers have no teaching qualification or no certified training
1: Up to 25% of the teachers have teaching qualification or certified training
2: Only Up to 50% of the teachers have teaching qualification or certified training
3: Only Up to 75% of the teachers have teaching qualification or certified training
4: Approximately 76%-100% of teachers meeting qualifications required by teacher Profile

indicator_51.label: Availability Of administrative staff With Relevant Qualification
options: 0: All administrative staff have irrelevant qualification
1: Up to 25% of the administrative staff have relevant qualification
2: Up to 50% of the administrative staff have relevant qualification
3: Up to 75% of the administrative staff have relevant qualification
4: All the administrative staff have relevant qualification

indicator_52.label: Availability Of All Administrative Staff According To Organisational Structure (School Head Teacher, Deputy Head Teacher In Charge Of Training And Deputy Head Teacher In Charge Of Discipline, Bursar/Accountant and Secretary )
options: 0: No administrative staff is available
1: Approximately up to 25% of administrative staff are available
2: Approximately 26-50% of administrative staff are available
3: Approximately 51-75% of administrative staff are available
4: Approximately 76-100% of administrative staff are available

indicator_53.label: Availability of complete staff files at school (application to an already operating school)
options: 0: No staff has a complete file
1: Approximately up to 25% of staff have a complete file
2: Approximately up to 50% of staff have a complete file
3: Approximately 51 to 75% of staff have a complete file
4: Approximately 76-100% of staff have a complete file
